resources.string: The eyeballs of Albert Einstein are stored in a safe deposit box in the city.
There are more undergrad and graduate students in NYC than Boston has people.
There are three baseball teams in NYC, the Mets, Yankees, and Dodgers.
Staten Island has the largest population of the boroughs.
The Empire State Building has a separate zip code.
Pinball was banned in NYC until 1978.
Are You Sure You Want To Do This?
